textBox.richText: ”The Children of Doctor Lancing” is just days away from being published! Final interior formatting is done, and I’m just waiting on the final cover now, designed by <--- this guy. If you’re looking for a way to kill time while you wait, go check out his CodePen page. CodePen is like Nanowrimo for coding. Every day in November he has to create a program. Some of them are silly, some of them are quite fun. Some of them are actually amazing tools disguised as fun little apps. Go check it out!
